RAW.SOURCE:
` *&---------------------------------------------------------------------* *& Include YGPL_MT_GTL_I_DATA_DEF *&---------------------------------------------------------------------* * Common include for Data definitions DATA o_data_handler TYPE REF TO ygplimt_data_bloc. DATA o_task TYPE REF TO ygpl_mt_task. DATA t_objects TYPE REF TO data. FIELD-SYMBOLS <objects> TYPE STANDARD TABLE.
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------* *& Form Create_task_and_handler *&---------------------------------------------------------------------* FORM create_task_and_handler. CREATE OBJECT o_data_handler TYPE (p_class). o_task ?= ygpl_mt_factories=>create_new_task( id = p_runid o_data_handler = o_data_handler ). o_data_handler->task = o_task. ENDFORM. "Create_task_and_handler
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------* *& Form New_bloc *&---------------------------------------------------------------------* FORM new_bloc. o_data_handler->new_bloc( IMPORTING table = t_objects ). ASSERT t_objects IS BOUND. ASSIGN t_objects->* TO <objects>. ASSERT sy-subrc = 0. ENDFORM. "New_bloc
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------* *& Form process_batch *&---------------------------------------------------------------------* FORM process_batch. o_data_handler->process_batch( EXPORTING objects = <objects> ). ENDFORM. "process_batch

ITEM.ENTRY: Generic Task Launcher Data defionition Include
